content.content: 1. The following industries are designated as interprovincially competitive industries: 1. The Fur Industry. 2. The Women’s Coat and Suit Industry. 3. The Women’s Dress and Sports-wear Industry. 4. The Men’s and Boys’ Clothing Industry. 5. The Men’s and Boys’ Hat and Cap Industry. 6. The Millinery Industry. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 653, s. 1; O. Reg. 281/99, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. The following industries are designated as interprovincially competitive industries:

1. The Fur Industry.

2. The Women’s Coat and Suit Industry.

3. The Women’s Dress and Sports-wear Industry.

4. The Men’s and Boys’ Clothing Industry.

5. The Men’s and Boys’ Hat and Cap Industry.

6. The Millinery Industry. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 653, s. 1; O. Reg. 281/99, s. 1.

Français
